name: RoborockManager
description: Manager used to control a Roborock S7 vacuum cleaner.

functions.name: finish_cleaning
functions.usage: Stop the current cleaning cycle and return the vacuum to its dock.

functions.name: clean_entire_house
functions.usage: Start a full house cleaning cycle.

functions.name: clean_room
functions.usage: Clean specific rooms by their IDs, repeat the cleaning the number_of_cleaning specified times.
